short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Your Informations and Simple Drag & Drop Into Form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fill Easy is the first version of fill any form easily. You can save your information by simply add your information by putting its property e.g Name, address, designation etc and its value e.g John Doe, House #03 New York, IT Officer etc. Then goto any form and drag the required value and drop it into the input. You don't need to remind your information or write any where. Please try it and give me your feedback. 

In case of any issues kindly mention it. thanks
